text: Death at Broadcasting House is a 1934 British mystery movie directed by Reginald Denham and was based on the novel of the same name. It stars Ian Hunter, Austin Trevor, Lilian Oldland, Henry Kendall, Val Gielgud, Peter Haddon, Betty Ann Davies, Jack Hawkins. ==Other websites== * Category:1934 movies Category:1930s mystery movies Category:British mystery movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Reginald Denham
title: Death at Broadcasting House
